name: Servant to the Serpent
description:
Short Description:

This is a game where you use you intellectual skill to piece a puzzle tile by tile and traverse from level to level to escape the temple, trapped there by unknown forces you must connect a serpent puzzle but... it isn't as simple as that.

Each level takes your further but it can also take you backwards, get use to the areas and where each output takes you because you'll need it.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

F - Flashlight

E - Pick up & Throw

I - Menu

Tab - Retrieve & Store Inventory

LMB - Place Tile

RMB - Rotate Tile

Space - Jump

Credits:

Lorne Hawke - Lead Programmer, Level Designer, Concept Artist

Bradley Morris - Lead Asset Creator, Texture Designer, Level Designer

Yvie Bailey - Lead UI Artist

Kelvin O'Brien Hamilton - Lead Terrain Designer, Asset Creator, Sound Designer
